alert.note: Alert for Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nueces, northwestern Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 340 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alice, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alice, Ben Bolt, Alice Acres, Palito Blanco, Tecalote and Lake Alice. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 664 and 684. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
